channel.title: Research on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.

item.title: Air-sea Interaction
item.description: Air-sea interactions We are investigating air-sea couplings to understand the climate system in both large- and meso-scale processes. For the research, we are using a coupled atmosphere-ocean model with biogeochemical module and explore the physical processes and their impact on biogeochemical processes including the carbon cycle.

item.title: Ocean Circulation
item.description: Southern Ocean The Southern Ocean is unique. Consistent eastward wind results in upwelling of the water from the interior of the ocean, providing a passage for the exchange between the atmosphere and deep ocean.

item.title: State estimation
item.description: California Current System The California Current System is located at the east of the north Pacific. Equatorward upwelling favorable wind draws nutrient-rich water from the interior to the surface making ocean very productive.
